sections.title: 🔥 Where You Can Grill
rules: Only in designated grilling areas shown on this map
Private property with owner permission
Balconies (with restrictions - see Private Property section)
Some camping areas and beaches outside Berlin city limits

sections.title: 🚫 Where Grilling is Prohibited
rules: All public parks and green spaces (except designated areas)
Forests and wooded areas
Near buildings, dry vegetation, or flammable materials
Children's playgrounds and sports facilities
Near water treatment facilities
On public streets, sidewalks, or bike paths

sections.title: 🔥 Fire Safety Requirements
rules: Keep water or sand nearby for emergencies
Never leave fire unattended
Completely extinguish fire before leaving
Check weather conditions - no grilling during fire warnings
Maintain 3-meter safety distance from vegetation
Do not grill during high wind conditions

sections.title: 🌱 Environmental Protection
rules: Use only approved charcoal or gas
No burning of wood, paper, or garbage
Dispose of ash and coals only when completely cold
Take all trash with you - leave no trace
Protect grass and vegetation
No dumping of grease or food waste

sections.title: 🕐 Time Restrictions
rules: Generally allowed from 8:00 AM to 10:00 PM
Some areas may have shorter hours
Respect quiet hours in residential areas
Check specific location rules for variations

sections.title: 🚨 Fire Ban Periods
rules: Complete grilling ban during official fire warnings
Usually affects July-August during dry weather
Check current fire danger level before grilling
Violations during fire bans result in heavy fines

sections.title: 💰 Fines and Penalties
rules: Illegal grilling: €5 - €5,000 depending on damage
Grilling during fire ban: €500 - €25,000
Causing fire damage: Criminal charges possible
Littering: €20 - €80
Noise violations after 10 PM: €25 - €5,000

sections.title: 👥 Social Considerations
rules: Keep noise levels reasonable
Share space respectfully with others
No excessive alcohol consumption
Supervise children at all times
Clean up thoroughly after use
